# OpenAlternative - Open Source Alternatives to Popular Software
A curated collection of the best open source alternatives to everyday SaaS products. Save money with reliable tools hand-picked for you.

## Blog Highlights
Links to our most popular blog posts.

- [7 Open Source Tools for Better Website Analytics](https://openalternative.co/blog/7-open-source-tools-for-website-analytics)
- [How Open Source Companies Make Money?](https://openalternative.co/blog/how-open-source-companies-make-money)
- [Top 5 Open Source Projects for Developers](https://openalternative.co/blog/top-5-open-source-projects-for-developers)

## Open source tools
- [Notesnook](https://openalternative.co/notesnook): Open Source Alternative to Notion, Obsidian and Evernote
- [Zed](https://openalternative.co/zed): Open Source Alternative to Cursor, Windsurf and GitHub Copilot
- [Cap](https://openalternative.co/cap): Open Source Alternative to CleanShot, Loom and Screen Studio
- [Novu](https://openalternative.co/novu): Open Source Alternative to Customer.io and Knock
- [Postiz](https://openalternative.co/postiz): Open Source Alternative to Typefully, Buffer and HootSuite
- [Plane](https://openalternative.co/plane): Open Source Alternative to Monday, Height and ClickUp
- [Affine](https://openalternative.co/affine): Open Source Alternative to Notion, Evernote and OneNote
- [AppFlowy](https://openalternative.co/appflowy): Open Source Alternative to Notion, Obsidian and Evernote
- [Pythagora](https://openalternative.co/pythagora): Open Source Alternative to Cursor, Windsurf and GitHub Copilot
- [Void](https://openalternative.co/void): Open Source Alternative to Cursor, Windsurf and GitHub Copilot
- [Rocket.Chat](https://openalternative.co/rocket-chat): Open Source Alternative to Discord, Slack and Microsoft Teams
- [Dify](https://openalternative.co/dify): Open Source Vertex AI Alternative
- [Kestra](https://openalternative.co/kestra): Open Source Alternative to Make, Zapier and N8N
- [Hoppscotch](https://openalternative.co/hoppscotch): Open Source Alternative to Postman and Testfully
- [Papermark](https://openalternative.co/papermark): Open Source Alternative to DocSend and Docuware
